#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int l;
#include<cstdio>
template<typename X> inline void inp(X &n ) {
     int ch=getchar();int sign=1;n=0;
     while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' ){if(ch=='-')sign=-1; ch=getchar();}
     while(  ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' ) n = (n<<3)+(n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=getchar();
     n=n*sign;
}const int fact=1e6;
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
int main()
{

    int t;
    inp(t);

    while(t--)
    {

        int n;
        inp(n);
        map<string,int> ma;string s;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {

        cin>>s;
        ma[s]++;

        }


        int nab=min(ma["ab"],ma["ba"]);
        int naa=ma["aa"];
        int nbb=ma["bb"];
        string ans="";
        if(ma["aa"]&1)
        {
            nbb/=2;
            nbb*=2;
            for(int i=1;i<=naa/2;i++)
            {

                ans+="aa";
            }
            for(int i=1;i<=nab;i++)
            {

                ans+="ab";
            }
            for(int i=1;i<=nbb/2;i++)
            {
                ans+="bb";
            }
            ans+="a";
            string str=ans;
            reverse(&str[0],&str[str.length()]);
            ans+=str;
            cout<<ans<<endl;

        }
        else
        {
            int rem=0;
            rem=nbb%2;
            for(int i=1;i<=naa/2;i++)
            {

                ans+="aa";
            }
            for(int i=1;i<=nab;i++)
            {

                ans+="ab";
            }
            for(int i=1;i<=nbb/2;i++)
            {

                ans+="bb";
            }
            if(rem)
                ans+='b';
                string str=ans;
            reverse(&str[0],&str[str.length()]);
            ans+=str;
            cout<<ans<<endl;



        }
        ma.clear();

    }


    }
